question: Which IT firm of India has launched an online self-certification course for frontline health workers, named ‘Corona Warriors’?
explanation:
A unit of the top IT firm Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), TCS iON, has recently launched a free online self-certification course for frontline health workers, named ‘Corona Warriors’.
The health workers who are dealing with COVID-19 patients will be offered profession-specific modules. The digital course is available in English and it is offered through TCS iON Digital Learning Hub. The software venture of TCS, Digitate has also announced a platform called 'ignio Cognitive Procurement' to assist enterprises in decision making of purchases.
